content: So I have a question that I want to ask as a thin person engaged to a larger man. How does one bring up the issue of health and weight (a legitimate concern) without seeming like a total jerk? I want him to take the concerns of his doctors seriously, if solely for the fact that he is already 10 years older than I am and I want to keep him around longer? If not for me, in case we have kiddos…
